translations: [宝] 海蓝宝石；碧绿色，浅绿色

sentences.sentence: The stunning gemstones include Aquamarine, Amethyst, Sugilite and etc.
sentences.translation: 令人惊叹的宝石包括海蓝宝石、紫水晶、苏纪石等。

sentences.sentence: It is one of the most popular stones from the beryl family, alongside aquamarine and emerald.
sentences.translation: 这是最受欢迎的宝石之一，从家庭的绿柱石，海蓝宝石和祖母绿一起。
